javax.security.identitystore.IdentityStore

    • Uses of IdentityStore in javax.security.identitystore.persistence

      Classes in javax.security.identitystore.persistence that implement IdentityStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractIdentityStore
      AbstractIdentityStore provides common behavior for implementations of IdentityStore.
      class  CachedIdentityStore
      CachedIdentityStore is an IdentityStore implementation which caches the entire source of identity data locally from a given source.
      class  DatabaseIdentityStore
      DatabaseIdentityStore is an IdentityStore implementation which uses an external database as a persistence mechanism.
      class  JaasIdentityStore
      JaasIdentityStore is an IdentityStore implementation which validates identity using a given JAAS configuration.
      class  LdapIdentityStore
      LdapIdentityStore is an IdentityStore implementation which uses an external LDAP server as a persistence mechanism.
